text: Arthur Steven Lange Jr. (born October 11, 1967) is an American stand-up comedian, actor, and radio personality. He is best known for his work on the sketch comedy series Mad TV from 1995 to 1997 and The Howard Stern Show from 2001 to 2009. Lange was diagnosed with diabetes in the early 2010s and needs daily injections of insulin. Lange is also known for being in many legal troubles such as being arrested, drug use and being a convicted felon. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Podcasters Category:American radio personalities Category:Television personalities from New Jersey Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:Comedians from New Jersey Category:People from Livingston, New Jersey Category:American people with disabilities Category:American criminals
title: Artie Lange
